page.title: 05Shopping on Coll
page.content: There are 4 main shops on Coll. There are 2 general stores a craft shop and the Post Office. They are all sighted in the village. There are different opening days depending on the seasons. In the winter they are open every boat day. That is Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday. During the summer the shops are open five and a half days a week(early closing Thurs.) Opening times are 9.30am.-1.00pm. and 2.00pm-5.30pm. The craft shop stocks Coll knitwear and Coll souvenirs. Some of the knitwear is knitted on the Isle of Coll. General goods are stocked in the two main shops,also fresh and frozen goods. There is also a sub-post office on the island. Catalogues and visiting drapers prove a useful way for islanders to purchase clothes.
